description: Resolves a promise after a specified delay.

name: sleep-promise

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:types
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:code && npm run test:eslint && npm run test:formatting && npm run test:typescript
